my3KCtGjoHjYgW3XO.name: Diffuse
my3KCtGjoHjYgW3XO.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mTowQ-wmV52EWUq7X.name: Homogenous
mTowQ-wmV52EWUq7X.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mzimqNZ-QhuJJJjkL.name: No Blood
mzimqNZ-QhuJJJjkL.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

m_4LLog7JNv7-Gbzd.name: No Brain
m_4LLog7JNv7-Gbzd.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mic0j6huRxmb2Sw-P.name: No Eyes
mic0j6huRxmb2Sw-P.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

m2f01ajEcshsmG3y1.name: No Head
m2f01ajEcshsmG3y1.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mNB82_MD2uU_8BskD.name: No Neck
mNB82_MD2uU_8BskD.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mxrUMghYgA-UgNcUG.name: No Vitals
mxrUMghYgA-UgNcUG.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mWYM6ztwTRE8HlTmT.name: Unliving
mWYM6ztwTRE8HlTmT.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
